verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve been told that there are those Who will learn how to fly And I’ve been told that there are those Who will never die And I’ve been told that there are stars That will never lose their shine And that there is a Morning Star Who knows my mind.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve been told that there’s A crystal lake in the sky And every tear from my eyes Is saved when I cry And I’ve been told there’ll come a time When the sun will cease to shine And that there is a morning star Who knows my mind.{/lang-eng}
